attributes.action: Covid-19 vaccine should be given to all MPs before ANY other recipients.
attributes.additional_details: To show confidence the vaccine to doubters and leaders should "lead" the way. MPs should not use the priority to vulnerable people as a counter argument.
attributes.background: All MPs, led by Matt Hancock and Boris Johnson should have their vaccines before any and all others irrespective of their positions or needs. 600 plus MP vaccines won't be missed out of the millions on order.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560861
